metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2153 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the advanced-search feature inmod_data in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.13, 2.8.x before2.8.11, 2.9.x before 2.9.5, and 3.0.x before 3.0.3 allows remote attackersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted field in a URL, asdemonstrated by a search form field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2153` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.13+dfsg-1').
